item.title: By: Andrew Magerman
item.dc:creator: Andrew Magerman
item.content:encoded:
Surely you mean 'In constrast to' ?

Greetings from Switzerland

Andrew

item.title: By: Mark Barton
item.dc:creator: Mark Barton
item.description: <p>I also like the tester record function - everyone does testing right ;-)</p><p>Basically if a tester spots a bug they can hit an action and it will create a file which can then be emailed to the developer, the developer can load this file up and replay the testers steps through the debugger to see what they did before it went wrong.</p>
item.content:encoded:
I also like the tester record function – everyone does testing right ðŸ˜‰

Basically if a tester spots a bug they can hit an action and it will create a file which can then be emailed to the developer, the developer can load this file up and replay the testers steps through the debugger to see what they did before it went wrong.
